price: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí kò bá sì jẹ́pè olùpèpè Allāhu, kò lè mórí bọ́ mọ́ (Allāhu) lọ́wọ́ lórí ilẹ̀. Kò sì sí aláàbò kan fún un lẹ́yìn Allāhu. Àwọn wọ̀nyẹn sì wà nínú ìṣìnà pọ́nńbélé.”
arabic: وَمَن لَّا يُجِبۡ دَاعِيَ ٱللَّهِ فَلَيۡسَ بِمُعۡجِزٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَيۡسَ لَهُۥ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءُۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waman lā yujib dāʿiya al-lahi falaysa bimuʿ'jizin fī al-arḍi walaysa lahu min dūnihi awliyāu ulāika fī ḍalālin mubīnin
